value:
$WmMPID_インバース,ch04_31_Inverse_F_Normal,Face|What a beautiful day! I know...now's
my chance to get to know
$Nu better...$k$pA lot better.$k$p$WmMPID_ロキ,ch00_08_Loki_F_Normal,Face|Oh, $Nu... I can't
find you anywhere!$k$pYou should know better than to try
and hide from me, dearie. How
naughty you are!$k$p$WmMPID_クリフ,ch10_17_Qulyf_M_Normal,Face|Are you two...sisters? Cousins
maybe?$k$p$WmMPID_インバース,ch04_31_Inverse_F_Normal,Face|There must be something wrong with
your eyes, little boy. We don't look a
thing alike.$k$p$WmMPID_クリフ,ch10_17_Qulyf_M_Normal,Face|It's not your looks, exactly... But
there is something about the two
of you. It's eerie.$k$p$WmMPID_ロキ,ch00_08_Loki_F_Normal,Face|Oh, my. Is that so? I think you'll find
there's one big difference between
us.$k$pYou see...$Nu
likes just ONE of us.$k$p$WmMPID_インバース,ch04_31_Inverse_F_Normal,Face|And I imagine you think that it's you...
What a show-off.$k$p$WmMPID_ロキ,ch00_08_Loki_F_Normal,Face|We're like two peas in a very cozy
pod, $Nu and I...$k$pI'm much more charming than you
are, dear. And I'm obviously so much
stronger. We make a perfect pair.$k$p$WmMPID_インバース,ch04_31_Inverse_F_Normal,Face|Stronger? I think we had better see
about that.$k$p$WmMPID_ロキ,ch00_08_Loki_F_Normal,Face|You want to fight me? How adorable.$k$pI'll just have to kill you, then... Too
bad, I suppose, but I must do what I
have to...for $Nu.$k$p$WmMPID_ウード,ch04_20_Eudes_M_Normal,Face|Ladies! We are allies here, bound by
fate! You must not quarrel! And you
certainly can't kill one another!$k$p$WmMPID_ロキ,ch00_08_Loki_F_Normal,Face|That's...quaint.$k$p$WmMPID_インバース,ch04_31_Inverse_F_Normal,Face|Owain. So you were summoned too.
Sniveling as usual, I see.$k$p$WmMPID_ウード,ch04_20_Eudes_M_Normal,Face|Sniveling? The chosen one does not
snivel!$k$pNow, as we have gathered under one
flag as allies, it makes no sense to
fight each other! I have an idea...$k$pIf you would fight, prove your worth
on the battlefield. Surely THAT would
impress $Nu!$k$p$WmMPID_ロキ,ch00_08_Loki_F_Normal,Face|You do have something there, dear...
I can prove just how strong I am. That
sounds like a lot of fun, doesn't it?$k$p$WmMPID_インバース,ch04_31_Inverse_F_Normal,Face|I accept the challenge!$k$p$WmMPID_ウード,ch04_20_Eudes_M_Normal,Face|Then so it shall be! And I, Dark
Swordsman, and Kliff, Villager Ablaze,
shall decide!$k$p$WmMPID_クリフ,ch10_17_Qulyf_M_Normal,Face|Me? Don't try to rope me into this.
And "Villager Ablaze"? What is that?$k$p$WmMPID_ウード,ch04_20_Eudes_M_Normal,Face|Only a village-dweller of the utmost
consequence, snagged in the skein
of fate, could be...Villager Ablaze!$k$pYour portentous utterances touched
off this contest of wills! You must see
it through to the bitter end!$k$p$WmMPID_クリフ,ch10_17_Qulyf_M_Normal,Face|What...are...you...talking...about?$k$p
